idea-plugin.name: Clean Architecture Generator
idea-plugin.description:
Generate production-ready Clean Architecture (MVVM) boilerplate for Android and Flutter projects directly from the IDE.

The plugin helps developers quickly scaffold well-structured features following clean architecture principles, reducing setup time and enforcing consistent architectural patterns.

Supported platforms:

  • Android: Kotlin (Hilt, Koin), Java (Dagger)
  • Flutter: Provider, Riverpod, Cubit, BLoC

Key features:

  • MVVM-based feature generation
  • Clean separation of Data, Domain, and Presentation layers
  • Dependency Injection support per platform
  • Consistent folder and file naming conventions
  • Ready-to-use boilerplate with minimal manual setup
